content.rendered:
Elizabeth Kaffenberger

Admin Recruiter

BS in Business Administration at Evangel University

 

Hi, I’m Elizabeth Kaffenberger. I recruit primarily for banking positions within a Fortune 500 client! I specialize in finance, accounting, and administrative roles. I am proud to be a part of ATR, a company that places a strong emphasis on flexibility and diversity, values that resonate with me deeply. As a dedicated recruiter, I am driven by the opportunity to connect talented individuals with roles that align perfectly with their aspirations. 

 

ADVICE FOR CANDIDATES:

A candidate can have the experience required in a job description, but if their resume doesn’t display that well, they can easily be overlooked! So, the biggest advice I would give to candidates is to look at a job description before applying and edit their resume to include some matching verbiage that they have experience in! This is a great way to make them stand out.

 

ADVICE FOR HIRING MANAGERS:

Move quickly! Most candidates are actively applying and interviewing with several companies and can become unavailable overnight, so if you are interested in a candidate, offer an interview in a reasonable timeframe, and don’t delay in making an offer.

 

HOBBIES AND INTERESTS:

My biggest hobbies outside of work are long distance running and bouldering!

 

FAVORITE PLACE:

The beach!

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“If you can’t be trusted with the small things, you can’t be trusted with the big things.”
